Title: Uproot the Cause
Description:
<Aviana's gaze remains locked on Q'onzu for a moment, her brow furrowed.> 
 
While I don't see eye to eye with Q'onzu's fascination for change, their incessant inquiry has unveiled a more deep-seated plot than originally suspected. 

Putting down the wildlife won't mean much if we don't tear out the root of the cause.  
 
Locate the burning ashphodels in the glade below and tear them out.
